name: project4_server
description: (cd into folder) frontend-client  1. create package.json for node     npm init -y 2. modify package.json : "type": "module",    modify package.json(scripts) : "start": "node index.js" 3. npm i express (creates node modules) 4.npm i mysql   npm i mysql2   npm i cors (allows access to both server and client) 5.npm start
